Field Detail

source

protected ObjectSource source
The source of data records to be sampled

index

protected int[] index
The subset of data records to be sampled (it is the marked data records). The sampling only uses the marked data records for generating the sample set If there is no marked records the sampling uses all the data records in the data source for generating the sample set

Constructor Detail

SamplingSource

public SamplingSource(ObjectSource source,
                      int[] index)
Constructor: Creates a sampling object with marked data records

Parameters:
source - Data source to be sampled
index - Data records that are marked (The records that are used for generating the sample set)
